name: Regret (PeaceLight)
description:
Do you wish you could take it back...

CONTROLS:

------------------------------------

Move: WASD

Sprint: Left Shift

Jump: Space

Interact: Left Mouse Button

Pick up: Hold Left Mouse Button

Throw:  Hold Left Mouse Button + Press Right Mouse Button

------------------------------------

CREDITS:

------------------------------------

Creator: Aaron Wallestad

Writer: Carl Licanan

------------------------------------

Author's Note:

This my first game I've release to the public. This was originally for a GameJam, but I missed the deadline. So I decided to finish it on my own time. Please leave comment of what you think, how could it improve, or any bugs found. I hope you enjoy it.
